content.question: Which of the following best describes the function of lines 17-22 in the context of the poem as a whole?

choices.label: They interrupt the narrative to create empathy and suspense regarding the fate of the trees.
They interrupt the narrative to criticize Don Miguel’s motives and the results of his actions.
They deliver the narrative’s unexpected resolution.
They deliver the intended moral of the narrative.

content.answer: They interrupt the narrative to create empathy and suspense regarding the fate of the trees.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
